Text.content: The following macros are available to set content-specific default values.

Text.name: Text0
Text.content: If the content is placed exactly at one page, the macro expands to the Title property of this page. Otherwise, it expands to the empty string.

Text.name: Text0
Text.content: If the content is placed exactly at one page, the macro expands to the NavPos property of this page. Otherwise, it expands to the empty string.

Text.name: Text0
Text.content: If the macro is expanded at the beginning of a string, it expands to the empty string. Otherwise, it expands to the value given as {string}.

Text.name: Text0
Text.content: The macro expands to the value of the current content element that is accessed via the given {XPath}.
